phrases: Senpai?
Senpai, are you awake?
Good morning, Sakura.
Right, same to you, Senpai.
Sorry, Sakura...
I should be helping with the morning chores.
Do not worry about that, Senpai.
You were up late again last night, were not you?
Dummy, that is no excuse.
Senpai, let me handle the morning chores.
If you leave the storehouse this messy, Fujimura-sensei will scold you.
Good point...
I guess I will have you do that, then.
Sure.
I will be waiting for you, Senpai.
Falling asleep before I finish proves I am lacking in concentration.
Perfect.
I feel terrible, making you do all this, Sakura.
It is no trouble at all.
I do it because I enjoy it.
Morning, Fuji-nee.
Yep, morning!
Let us eat!
Let us eat.
Senpai?
Th-This is Worcestershire sauce!
Worcestershire sauce on grated yams...
And it is oyster flavor, no less!
Yay!
Who pulls a stunt like that, first thing in the morning?
You will be twenty-five this year.
But you will always be the same Fuji-nee.
You deserved it!
It is payback for yesterday!
Senpai, have some tea!
You seemed awfully quiet.
So it was because you would been plotting this since yesterday.
Damn straight.
And because of that, now I have to get going in a hurry to grade some tests.
So I have got to run, or I will never finish in time!
Thanks for breakfast!
See you at school!
Make sure you are not late.
And do not go back to sleep, okay?
Well, I am out of here!
Breakfast was as delicious as ever, Sakura-chan!
It was nothing, Fujimura-sensei.
Damn that Fuji-nee.
Even if she is the landlord's daughter, why must she eat here every day?
She is no better than a freeloader.
Did you do something to her yesterday?
I accidentally called her by her nickname.
Then it was really your own fault.
You cannot do that.
Your using that nickname is the one thing she hates.
Suspect Had No License, Minivan Had Malfunctioning Brakes
Gas Leak in New Fuyuki Business District
In our next story,
workers in a building in New Fuyuki's business district passed out
and were taken to the hospital late last night.
According to a police spokesman,
Gas Leak in New Fuyuki Business District
since victims seemed to be suffering from hypoxia,
they believe it may have been the result of a gas leak.
However, given a similar incident that occurred last month,
Hear that?
Another gas leak in New Fuyuki.
investigating police are exercising extreme caution due to the possibility of a link.
That is messed up.
We need to be careful, too.
Do not worry.
I always double-check the gas valve, so we will be safe.
No, not about that...
Well, work hard at club practice.
About that, Senpai...
Maybe you could stop by the dojo?
I have to go to the student council office this morning.
O-Oh, of course.
I am sorry.
Forget I asked.
Well, I should get going.
Look forward to dinner tonight, okay?
The school's budgeting priorities are completely out of whack.
Yeah, athletic clubs get the lion's share of the budget, and the rest get crumbs.
Yes.
As a result, the non-athletic club rooms are in poor repair.
They have given zero thought to resolving our heater issues.
There are more broken heaters?
There are.
Like I thought, this one's just showing its age.
Can you fix it, Emiya?
I can.
Really?
Issei, I will have it fixed in a jiffy, so could you wait outside?
Of course.
I will get out of your way.
Okay, then...
Two spots where the heating element is about to break...
The heat transfer pipes are still good.
For now, I can patch the power cord with electrical tape.
Tohsaka...
Tohsaka?
Well, if it is not the student council president.
Patrolling the campus so early in the morning?
Or are you making maintenance rounds of the club rooms?
Not that I care either way.
Still, you are the diligent student as always.
And what do you have up your sleeve?
Why are you here so early, when you are not in any clubs?
I just felt like it.
I fixed it, Issei.
Oh, sorry.
I asked you for help, but you did it all, Emiya.
My bad.
Where is the next one?
I do not have a lot of time.
The next one's in the A/V room.
They say it is been acting up lately, but it is finally exhausted its lifespan.
If it is dead, I cannot fix that.
Buying a new one would be faster.
That is true, but I would appreciate it if you could take a look at it anyway.
It looked dead to me, but you may be able to see if it is just faking or really dead.
Okay, I will try...
You are here early, Tohsaka.
The art club's heater will have to wait until lunch.
Sure.
You are quite the busy bee this morning, Emiya.
I was wondering what you would been up to after you quit the club.
You are the student council president's errand boy?
If you need something, you can tell me, Shinji.
If it is something I can help with, I will.
You never were very good at restringing and mending bows.
I do not want your help.
And anyway, you are not a member anymore, so stay out of the dojo!
What a jerk,
talking to you like that, when he is the one who drove you out of the club.
It is okay.
That is just how he is.
When you have known him a long time, you get used to it.
Do you, now?
You do.
Oops, Fujimura-sensei is about to come barreling in.
Yes!
I made it!
Good morning, class!
I will call the roll now!
Emiya, you would better wolf that down, or you will not finish before lunch ends.
It is okay, I am almost done.
You could have stopped with the heaters.
You did not have to agree to fix personal items, too.
Do not worry about it.
As they say, In for a penny, in for a pound.
There is such a thing as being too considerate.
Being helpful is all well and good, but maybe you should be a little more selective.
You take turn no one away to extremes.
Do I look that unprincipled to you?
You are opening yourself up to being taken advantage of by the unscrupulous.
Surely you could turn people down, once in a while.
What are you talking about?
Helping others is a good deed.
The heir to a temple should not make a fuss over that.
I am just saying that you take it too far, Emiya.
Keep going like this, and it will burn you out.
Duly noted.
Okay, all done!
If you do not summon yours soon, you are going to die, mister.
At times like this, you should really come home early!
I said in homeroom that it has not been safe in town lately, remember?
Um...
Something came up.
Do you get that from Kiritsugu-san?
I worry about you because you are always trying to help people...
Excuse me, Fujimura-sensei?
Has Senpai always been this way?
Yeah, for as long as I have known him.
Shirou just does not have it in him to ignore people in need.
Comfort the afflicted, and afflict the comfortable, you know?
As a kid, he wrote in an essay, My dream is to become a hero of justice when I grow up.
Wow, you were an amazing child!
Chalk it up to Fuji-nee.
When kids see immature adults, they have funny ideas put in their heads.
If you do not like it, cook your own damn meal for once.
Wha?
You are reducing your big sis to tears!
Sakura-chan, refill!
Trace on.
Tracing fundamental structure.
Tracing component materials.
Altering fundamental structure.
Strengthening component materials.
Damn, I failed again.
I cannot believe that I still cannot do something so basic.
I am going to be a novice forever.
I just do not know...
How do I become a hero of justice?
Sakura...
Wait a second.
Yes?
What happened to your wrist?
Shinji again?
What is he thinking, raising a hand to his little sister?
N-No, that is not it, Senpai!
I, um, bumped it when I tripped and fell.
You cannot get a bruise like that from tripping.
I knew it.
Honest, my brother had nothing to do with this.
I got hurt by myself, that is all!
If that is what you say happened, I will leave it at that.
It is.
I am sorry, Senpai.
Why are you apologizing, Sakura?
Shinji's the one who is to blame.
Do I smell your famous rolled omelets, Shirou?
What is up, Emiya?
Let us eat.
Sorry, Issei... I am going to eat in the cafeteria today.
You do not usually eat there.
Did something happen?
Not really.
Excuse me.
Is Ryuudou here?
Yes, I am here.
What is it, Kuzuki-sensei?
Going for the Chef's Choice for lunch today, huh?
You are not eating with the student council president today?
I guess not.
Say, Mitsuzuri...
Has Sakura seemed okay to you lately?
Sakura?
Yeah, she is practicing her heart out.
Oh.
It is her brother that is the problem.
He is been tearing into the first-year boys.
What for?
From what I hear, he got shot down pretty hard by Tohsaka.
By Tohsaka?
Keep your voice down!
Anyway, ever since yesterday, Shinji's been in a foul mood.
I have had to keep a close eye on Shinji during practice, so I am exhausted.
Yeah, Shinji does have a nasty temper...
I hear he plans to do something to Tohsaka, to get even.
No, I doubt even Shinji would try to get anywhere near someone who would rejected him.
But if she comes to where he is, he cannot avoid her.
I do not know why, but recently, Tohsaka's been coming to watch at the dojo a lot.
You probably do not know, since you quit and all!
That was hilarious earlier!
He practically peed his pants!
When Shinji gets mad, he does not know when to stop.
Hey, you!
Matou Shinji, I hate to break it to you,
but no matter how long you wait, Tohsaka Rin is not coming!
Maki, this guy does not match Mitsuzuri's description.
He does not have wavy hair, either.
The way I see it, he just wet his naturally curly hair down today.
A face this stupid-looking could only belong to Matou Shinji!
No, I am not Shinji.
See what I mean?
That is what the bad guys all say.
Wait.
Sorry, but would you mind showing us your student ID?
S-Sure.
NAME Emiya Shirou CLASS 2 C
Maki-chan, we have the wrong man.
Emiya?
That Emiya?
That guy who fixes our gear whenever he has a spare moment?
The one they call Homurahara's Brownie?
I do not know that nickname, but I do know the track club president when I see her.
We are sorry.
You seemed to be looking for someone, so we just assumed...
That is okay.
What was that about Tohsaka not coming?
Has something happened?
She stayed home today.
Yeah!
Tohsaka says she has a cold, so she is staying home, good sir.
Hard to believe a model student like her is capable of catching a cold, though.
We are sorry if our exotic beast here caused you any trouble, Emiya.
But you should not be here, either.
Were not you told that students with no club meetings should go straight home?
Did something happen?
You do not know?
There was a murder incident at the intersection near the school.
Of the family of four, the only survivor was a child.
They say the parents and older sister were stabbed to death.
The killer is still at large,
and everyone is freaking out about the way it seems like a random killing.
In New Fuyuki, it is those gas leaks.
Over here, we have got grisly murders.
It is no wonder they are sending students home early.
I do know...
Helping others and being a hero of justice are not the same thing.
Ah, I see.
Thank you.
Hello.
You must be Shirou-kun.
I will come right out and ask you which you would prefer...
Being sent to an orphanage or being taken in by a man you have just met?
I am glad.
Then let us get you dressed right away.
You should get acclimated to your new home as soon as possible.
Oh, I forgot to mention something important.
There is something extremely important that I have to tell you.
Ready?
Yeah.
I should get this out of the way.
I am a magic-user...
I have some time before I need to get to work.
He is alive...
He is alive...
He is alive!
Thank you...
Thank you!
I am so glad I found you...
By saving even one person,
I am saved myself.
All I remember of that day, ten years ago, is that it was hot, and I could not breathe.
And people were trying to save others, all of them dying in the process.
I hate that.
It makes me mad when people who try so hard die.
Is it greedy of me to wish for an outcome
in which everyone is saved and happy, and can share a laugh about it afterward?
It is not that simple.
Because what you are describing is the act of trying to save everyone, Shirou.
My younger self was not convinced by Kiritsugu's answer.
I mean, Kiritsugu saved my life, right?
I knew he was a magic-user, who could do anything.
So I asked Kiritsugu if, back then,
he could have saved everyone.
But Kiritsugu... He...
Shirou,
saving one person means being unable to save another.
You see, one can only save those
who belong to one's own side.
It should be obvious, but that is the very definition of a hero of justice.
I understand that now.
When you put it like that, it is obvious.
But still...
But still, I hate it.
I am not interested in a salvation that is inherently limited to a set number of people.
I cannot bear the thought of strangers dying around me, as they did that day!
That was Tohsaka...
Was not it?
Where is Sakura?
She went home early tonight.
Why did you send her home alone?
You were the one who warned us that going out alone was not safe, remember?
It is fine, it is fine.
I sent one of my guys with her.
You should have been the one to go.
You are our teacher, after all.
If I would done that, I would not get to eat dinner until after 10...
Anyway, it is your own fault for coming home so late because of work!
On your work days, my stomach always has to patiently wait.
Hey, do not you have the option of eating dinner at your own house?
I have told you, this is my own house.
Sheesh...
What is this?
Luck, Come In!
Customer Appreciation Sale
Oh, someone gave that to me, but I do not want it, so you can have it!
I do not want it, either!
If you think you can hit me with skills like yours, you are sadly mistaken.
If you do not like it, I suggest you practice more.
But more importantly, Shirou, I am famished!
I have been waiting for ages, so hurry up and make dinner!
Yeah, yeah.
Senpai, after tonight, I will not be able to help with dinner for a while.
Do you mind?
Do not worry about it.
It is the weekend, anyway.
You should be hanging out with your friends.
No, it is not like that!
It is a personal thing, but I will still be going to club practices!
S-So if anything comes up, please come to the dojo, and I will do what I can.
It is not like I am goofing off, just because it is the weekend!
So, I would appreciate it...
if you did not get the wrong idea.
Understood.
If something comes up, I will go to the dojo.
Okay, that would be great.
Senpai!
Your hand!
Where did this come from?
Did I cut myself while I was tinkering with my old junk?
Well, it does not hurt or anything, so it should fade soon.
I am fine.
It is nothing to worry about.
Okay, if you say so...
Maybe I am just tired.
Thanks to you, Emiya, it looks like we will have all the equipment fixed before exams begin.
I have to thank you again.
No problem.
See you later.
No, it was nothing!
You think that was amazing?
Shinji...
Still at school, Emiya?
I need to talk to you.
Come with me for a minute.
A minute?
Sorry.
As you can see, I am busy.
Whatever your little problem is, it can wait.
Is not that right, girls?
Hang on, Shinji.
This is about the bruise on Sakura's wrist.
What is this about Sakura?
Do not dodge the question.
You hurt her again!
Like I know anything about her!
Even though you are siblings?
Look, Emiya...
You are getting on my nerves.
If it is about something between siblings, is not that all the more reason for you to butt out?
You really do not know how she got it?
Nope!
Or is Sakura saying that I beat her?
No.
There you go, then.
It is not nice to make reckless accusations, Emiya.
I suppose so.
I am sorry I suspected you.
If you feel bad, then do me a favor.
See, the dojo's kind of a mess right now...
If you have all this free time, maybe you could do something about it, Emiya-kun?
Did not Fujimura-sensei tell you to do that, Senpai?
She did!
If you do not do it, she will...
It is fine.
Anyway, if I start cleaning now, the shop will be closed by the time I finish.
I know I can count on you!
Wait, Senpai!
Thank you so much!
Man, this place never changes.
Done!
Who are they?
Who is there?
Hey.
Today just was not your lucky day, kid.
Now that you have seen me, you have to die.
Dead men tell no tales, and all that.
With your dying breath, curse that you were born with no luck or power.
You make me do some nasty jobs.
It is a sick joke for a hero to act like this.
I understand.
I am not complaining.
The girl's Servant saw me.
I will be a good boy and return.
Jeez, my Master is a real piece of work.
If his heart was hit, there is no way to save him.
Do not do this to me...
Why are you here?
Why did you have to pick this hour, on this day, to be here?
There is still a way.
What happened?
That man in blue and that man in red...
Who were those two?
They were not ordinary humans.
So I really was nearly killed.
No,
I was not nearly killed.
I was killed.
But here I am, alive.
Someone who came along afterward saved me.
Who was it?
I wish I could at least thank them.
I was trying to be considerate, figuring it would hurt more if you saw it coming.
Stuck with killing the same person twice in one day...
I guess the human world is a bloody place, whatever the era.
Trace on.
Find your way to the other side this time, kid.
Strengthening component materials.
That is an odd style.
It is faint, but I sense mana.
So that is why you are still alive after your heart was skewered.
This might be fun, after all.
I gave you a chance, but you went and wasted it.
If you are a man, show some dignity.
Checkmate.
That last move was pretty surprising, kid.
I do not get it, though...
You think fast on your feet, but you are hopeless at magecraft.
You do seem to have a knack for it...
Maybe you were meant to be the seventh.
Well, even if you were, this is the end for you.
Screw this...
My life was saved.
My life was saved, so I will not die that easily.
I need to live, to fulfill my duties.
And I cannot do that if I am dead.
I am not going to be killed in a place like this,
for no good reason, by a guy like you,
who kills people like it is nothing!
The seventh Servant?
I ask...
Are you my Master?
Master?
Your Servant, Saber, has come in response to your summons.
Master, your orders?
Henceforth, my sword will be at your side.
Henceforth, your fate is my fate.
The pact is now sealed.
What do you mean by pact?
Coward!
What is the meaning of this, concealing your weapon?
What is the matter, Lancer?
If you stand there, you will give spearmen a bad name.
If you will not come to me, I shall come to you.
Before you do, let me ask you one thing.
Your Noble Phantasm...
Is it a sword?
Who can say?
It may be a battle axe.
Or perhaps a polearm.
Or it might even be a bow, Lancer.
Very funny, swordswoman!
That stance...
One more question.
Since this is our first meeting, would you be interested in calling it a draw?
I think not.
You will fall here, Lancer.
Is that so?
My objective was simply to observe...
I will have your heart!
Gae...
Bolg!
So, you dodged my lethal strike, Saber.
A curse?
No, a strike that reverses because and effect?
Gae Bolg...
You are Ireland's Child of Light!
I messed up...
It needs to be fatal if I use that move, or I am in trouble.
My lord is a coward, you see.
You dodged my spear, so he is ordering me home.
You would run?
But if you do, be prepared to die!
Wait, Lancer!
I-Is she an idiot?
Hey, are you okay?
What the hell are you?
As you can see, I am your Saber-class Servant.
As such, please call me Saber.
I am Shirou...
Emiya Shirou.
Emiya...
This house...
No, that is not right.
That is not what I want to ask you.
I know.
You are not a proper Master, are you?
And yet, regardless, you are my Master.
W-Wait, is not it weird, calling me Master all of a sudden?
Then I shall call you Shirou.
Yes, the sound of that is pleasing to me.
Wh-What are these?
Those are what are called Command Seals.
Do try to avoid careless use.
Shirou, my wounds, please...
You are asking me?
Sorry, but complicated magic like that is beyond me.
Then, I shall face them as I am.
There are two enemies outside.
One more battle should not pose a problem.
What do you mean by enemies outside?
Stop, Saber!
Are you mad, Shirou?
I could have defeated them handily, but you ordered me to stop!
Just hold on, Saber.
I have no idea what is going on.
If I am your Master, at least fill me in.
You would demand this with the enemy before us?
Hmm?
So that is how it is, Mr. Novice Master?
At any rate, good evening,
Emiya-kun.
I have no reason to fight.
He is, without question, a fake priest.
Shirou is my Master.
Berserker?
Whether or not you decide to participate in the Holy Grail War,
let us decide it here, Emiya Shirou.
Next Time The Curtain Rises
